alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Elder County through 430 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Park Valley to 24 miles east of Montello. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Locomotive Springs, Standrod, Lynn, Curlew Junction, Rosette and Yost. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 12 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
